name: Positivity Patrol
description:
Positivity patrol is a submission to the Stareye Atlas Jam with the theme "We raise ourselves by lifting others".  The game takes a rather ironic approach at the theme by having the protagonist, Sandra, make her carreer at the Smileville Police Department by making sure to lighten everyone's moods with a happiness-inducing drug. The game is a top-down perspective shooter with a short storyline and different endings depending on the player's score.

Contributors:
Katcorn: Concept artist, menu screen image, co-writer
Auer Felix, Fenec: Playtesting and feedback
